title: G4MF Camera
description: A camera provides a view from a location in the scene.

clipFar.description: The distance to the far clipping plane. If not defined, the camera does not have an explictly defined far clipping plane.

clipNear.description: The distance to the near clipping plane. If not defined, the camera does not have an explictly defined near clipping plane.

fov.description: The field of view of the camera in degrees. Only used for perspective cameras. If defined, must be greater than 0 and no more than 3.1415925 radians.

keepAspect.description: The screen space dimension index that the `fov` and `size` correspond to. 0 refers to the screen width, 1 refers to the screen height, 2 or more refer to additional dimensions. If not defined, the default is 1, referring to the screen height.

size.description: The size in meters of the camera. Only used for orthographic cameras. If not defined, the camera has a size of 1 meter.

type.description: The type of camera. The camera type determines how the camera is projected into the scene.
